lead_paragraph: The police officers who raided offices of the Roman Catholic Church last week in a sexual abuse investigation also took documents from the National Archives, that body said Wednesday.
snippet: The police officers who raided offices of the Roman Catholic Church last week in a sexual abuse investigation also took documents from the National Archives, that body said Wednesday.

headline.main: Belgium: National Archives Affected in Raid of Church Offices
headline.print_headline: Belgium: National Archives Affected In Raid of Church Offices
